subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Detroit, here they come: a hot team in Villanova; a team facing distractions in Connecticut; a largely anonymous team in Michigan State; and a very talented team in North Carolina.
snippet: Detroit, here they come: a hot team in Villanova; a team facing distractions in Connecticut; a largely anonymous team in Michigan State; and a very talented team in North Carolina.
